chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
lllmi: leaderLogs_entries_match_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface
si: sorted_interface
lpholli: log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo ll 0

Premises:
term = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler : input -> data
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net :
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : electionsData) => let (_, _, _, leaderLogs, _) := e in leaderLogs : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), electionsData -> list (term * list entry) Arguments leaderLogs {orig_base_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
leaderLogs_contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo ll 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_contiguous {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) ll : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (P : list entry -> Prop) (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry), log_property P -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> P ll : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> sorted log : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) ->...-> Prop Arguments logs_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_leaderLogs_nw_weak = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> exists (leader : Net.name) (ll es' ll' : list entry), In (eTerm e, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) /\ Prefix ll' ll /\ removeAfterIndex es (eIndex e) = es' ++ ll' /\ (forall e' : entry, In e' es' -> eTerm e' = eTerm e) /\ weak_sanity pli ll ll' : network -> Prop
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll es : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) /\ log (snd (nwState net h)) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_leaderLogs_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es ->...-> Prop Arguments logs_leaderLogs_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
allEntries_gt_0_invariant : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0
entries_match_nw_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e'' es ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_gt_0 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> eIndex e > 0 } Arguments refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0 net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted net) ->...-> refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
update_elections_data_requestVoteReply_leaderLogs : forall (h h' : name) (t : nat) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t' : term) (ll' : list entry) (r : bool), In (t', ll') (leaderLogs (fst st)) -> In (t', ll') (leaderLogs (update_elections_data_requestVoteReply h h' t r st))
log_property = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : list entry -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (log (snd (nwState net h))) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, (list entry -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments log_property {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
nextIndex_sanity : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (h' : name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h') <> 0 -> exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) (Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h')) = Some e
lift_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> sorted (log (snd (nwState net h)))
entries_contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, contiguous_range_exact_lo (log (snd (nwState net h))) 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_contiguous_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_invariant : forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))
entries_gt_0_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eIndex e > pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
nextIndex_safety = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (h' : name), type (nwState net h) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (nwState net h) h') <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments nextIndex_safety {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
contiguous_log_property = fun (net : network) (h : Net.name) (H : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net) => entries_contiguous_invariant net H h : log_property (fun l : list entry => contiguous_range_exact_lo l 0)
weak_sanity = fun (pli : nat) (ll ll' : list entry) => pli = 0 -> (exists e : entry, eIndex e = 0 /\ In e ll) \/ ll = ll' : nat -> list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments weak_sanity _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
entries_match_nw_1 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (p' : packet) (t' : term) (n' : name) (pli' : logIndex) (plt' : term) (es' : list entry) (ci' : logIndex) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> In p' (nwPackets net) ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_1 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
